entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS LATE THIS EVENING
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR, COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
